entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -18.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 01:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -18.1°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -20.3°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening then 30 percent chance of rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
